gui.mgmc.blueprint_selection.title: Select Blueprint
gui.mgmc.about.title: About Maingraph for MC
gui.mgmc.about.info: Maingraph for MC is an advanced visual blueprint engine designed for Minecraft. Through intuitive node connections, it allows players and developers to implement complex logic automation, custom event handling, and interactive features without writing complex code.
gui.mgmc.mapping.title: Blueprint Mapping Manager
gui.mgmc.mapping.add_id.title: Add New Mapping ID
gui.mgmc.mapping.select_blueprint.title: Select Blueprint to Bind
gui.mgmc.blueprint_editor.title: Blueprint Editor - %s
gui.mgmc.blueprint_editor.instructions: Right click to add. Drag ports to connect. DEL to delete. Box select supported.

mgmc.configuration.max_recursion_depth.t: Max recursion depth to prevent server crash from infinite loops

mgmc.configuration.allow_server_run_comm: Whether to allow saving blueprints containing 'Run Command as Server' nodes. Disabling this improves security.

gui.mgmc.version_warning.title: Blueprint Version Warning
gui.mgmc.version_warning.message: This blueprint is version v%d, but the current editor is v%d. Opening it directly may cause some features to malfunction or corrupt the blueprint. It is recommended to copy and open it in the new version.
